alert.note: Alert for Ripley (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 3:52AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ripley County through 430 AM CDT... At 350 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm just west of Doniphan, moving east at 25 mph. Another strong storm was over rural northwest Ripley county. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Doniphan around 400 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Oxly, Fairdealing and Naylor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
